item.description:
I'm covering the March for Babies on Sunday the 19th of April for the March of Dimes. I'm looking for a second, third, or as many as we can to photograph the event. No, it is not a paid gig. March of Dimes is non-profit. But it is a good cause and fun to photograph. Maybe we could treat this like a click and shoot? The turn around time for the images is very quick though, so I will ask anyone who joins to send me your best stuff the next day.
Check out last year's event...

Worcester March for Babies


Please contact me if you're interested:
Thanks,
Jeff

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Come Photograph-March for Babies for the March of Dimes
